Nucleic Acid Analysis¶

pytraj.nastruct(traj=None, mask='', resmap=None, hbcut=None, ref=None, top=None, dtype='nupars', *args, **kwd)¶

Examples

>>> import pytraj as pt
>>> pt.nastruct(traj0)
>>> pt.nastruct(traj1, resmap='AF2:A')

Examples¶

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [1]: traj = pt.iterload('data/adh026.3.pdb')

In [1]: traj

# check unique residue names
In [1]: traj.top.residue_names

In [1]: na = pt.nastruct(traj)

In [1]: na

# get mean and std for each analysis (major groove width, minor, ...)
In [1]: na.mean_and_std()

# get raw data for major groove
In [1]: na.dataset.filter(lambda x : 'major' in x.key)
